TopicTitle: Still finding new things! this update was insane (in an epic love you squad way)

Articles.Content:
Sooo found two more "changes" that weren't mentioned at least I didn't see it. 

Firstly... .![93A097FB202EC82DFC11BFF1875F70739C5B4540](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/527262341751269507/93A097FB202EC82DFC11BFF1875F70739C5B4540/)

Look at that incredible North Pole \*.\* That's at 600m It was incredibly beautiful. 

And then.. I got a laugh out of this one, because it shows the devs care about mods. 

![EBF413F8E1541BB8E196D0C28E90712FB0B20C1F](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/527262341751298479/EBF413F8E1541BB8E196D0C28E90712FB0B20C1F/)

I can't say how much I love this new update.. I need to re learn everything all over again.. which is.. refreshing and new.. I love it.

I know, it's great! I'm loving the new effects with the sideways smoke and dust on takeoff/landing. I haven't played enough to experience it yet, but I expect that the new aero and ISRU will make the game even deeper than it already is. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
